channel.title: SHH:601012 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in SHH:601012 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Two Chinese Solar Giants End Legal Fight as Industry Struggles
item.description: LONGi Green Energy Technology Co. and Jinko Solar Co. have agreed to settle their patent lawsuits to help promote growth in an industry that has struggled with overcapacity and deep losses.
